entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is described as trying to push Harry out of the way and snarling at him. He is also looking towards the door with his wand pointing into Snape's face.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as saying 'Why, yes, I suppose I am' (a coward) and having his wand pointed at Sirius.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as not budging when Sirius tries to push him out of the way and trying to force Snape and Sirius apart with his hands.

entities.name: weasley family
entities.description: The Weasley family is described as coming inside the kitchen, all looking very happy, with Mr. Weasley walking proudly in their midst dressed in a pair of striped pajamas covered by a mackintosh.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as coming inside the kitchen with the rest of the Weasley family.

relationships.description: Sirius and Snape are looking towards each other with their wands pointed at each other's faces, indicating a confrontation between them.
Harry is standing immobile between Sirius and Snape, trying to force them apart with his hands.
Snape and Sirius are looking towards each other with their wands pointed at each other's faces, indicating a confrontation between them.
The Weasley family is described as coming inside the kitchen.
Mr. Weasley and Hermione are described as coming inside the kitchen together.
